titles.title: There Is a Safe and Secret Place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a safe and secret place, Beneath the wings Divine, Reserved for all the heirs of grace; O be that refuge mine!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The least and feeblest there may bide, Uninjured and unawed; While thousands fall on every side He rests secure in God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He feeds in pastures, large and fair, Of love and truth Divine; O child of God, O glory's heir, How rich a lot is thine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: A hand almighty to defend, An ear for every call, An honored life, a peaceful end, And heaven to crown it all!
